attributes.action: SAY NO TO THE EU..SET BRITAIN FREE
attributes.additional_details:
Why are we still sending £49 million every day to the EU ?   Answer: Because you are not doing enough to stop them.

The political elite of Con/LibDem and Labour are all ignoring the people of this country.

Do your bit for a change.  Get up and speak, stand for election, do something and sign this petition We really must rule for ourselves -

Do not let others arbitrarily rule over us.

We Must Stay British And Not Become european

SAY NO TO THE EU..SET BRITAIN FREE

The People Of Britain Want Out Of The Eu
